Clinically Shown To Reveal Smoother-looking Skin Overnight

Retinol & Peptide Complex

Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body & Face Lotion features Retinol-Peptide Complex to help visibly tighten and lift the skin for a more youthful appearance. It contains stabilized retinol to maintain efficacy over time.

7 Moisturizers + 3 Vitamins

This body and face lotion with retinol locks in moisture while you sleep. It’s clinically shown to instantly hydrate skin and provide continuous moisture for 24 hours.

All Over Body Use

Gold Bond Retinol Overnight lotion is gentle for everyday use on body and face. The non-irritating formula absorbs quickly and is non-greasy. Best of all, this Gold Bond Age Renew Lotion will not clog pores.

Frequently Asked Questions

What does Retinol do?

Retinol is the most clinically tested anti-aging ingredient.* It supports the skin renewal process by exfoliating to reveal smoother, younger-looking skin. Gold Bond uses stabilized retinol to maintain its efficacy overtime. 93% saw visibly smooth skin in just 3 days

*Based on number of clinical tests for anti-aging efficacy.

Will this Retinol cream dry out my skin?

This Gold Bond lotion is dermatologist-developed and tested to be a non-drying, non-irritating retinol formula. It also contains hydrating shea butter and cocoa butter to nourish skin for 24 hours.

Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Daily Body & Face Lotion is free from parabens, phthalates, dyes, and fragrances

When will I see results?

81% saw visible improvement in lines, wrinkles, and elasticity at eight weeks with daily use. What’s more, Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight lotion is clinically shown to reveal smoother-looking skin overnight.

Product Description

Smoother-looking skin is a sleep away with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body and Face Lotion. Formulated with retinol, the most clinically tested anti-aging ingredient, this lotion for mature skin helps visibly improve bounce and elasticity to skin. How it works: Retinol supports skin's collagen to visibly tighten and lift skin for a more youthful appearance. This Gold Bond Age Renew lotion also provides long-lasting hydration with nourishing shea and cocoa butter. The non-drying, non-irritating retinol formula even locks in moisture while you sleep. Best of all, this dermatologist-developed and tested lotion is hypoallergenic and free from parabens, dyes and fragrances. It's suitable for all over the body and face everyday use, when used as directed. Experience visible improvement in fine lines and wrinkles with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight lotion. Your skin is a champion. One that never settles for silver. Gold Bond is high-performance skin care for real life so you can be your best while keeping your skin at its best. Based on number of clinical tests for anti-aging efficacy At 8 weeks with daily use.

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.
